<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>itfm_plan_key</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="itfm_plan_key">nameISEMPTY^ORnameEMPTYSTRING^EQ<item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="EMPTYSTRING" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Set Name for Plan Key</name> <order>1000</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { // Add your code here var _itfmPlanning = new ITFM_Planning();
var nameValues = []; for(var column in current.key_filter) { var value = _itfmPlanning.getKeyValueName(column, current.key_filter[column]); nameValues.push(value) ; }
current.setValue('name', nameValues.join(' - ')); })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-07-30 23:29:54</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>116db6d15f14030062b36e303e466607</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set Name for Plan Key</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Financial Planning Core" source="com.snc.financial_planning">0e10166b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4326</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_116db6d15f14030062b36e303e466607</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-09-25 10:25:19</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=116db6d15f14030062b36e303e466607"/> </record_update>
